jopt.csp.spi.search.localsearch
Class SelectCurrentNeighborAction

java.lang.Object
  jopt.csp.spi.search.tree.AbstractSearchNodeAction
      jopt.csp.spi.search.localsearch.SelectCurrentNeighborAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
jopt.csp.search.SearchAction
public class SelectCurrentNeighborAction
extends AbstractSearchNodeAction

Advises neighborhoods and metaheuristics that the current neighbor is about to be made the new initial solution. This is preferable to the StoreSolutionAction since it will call the neighborSelected() method on the neighborhood that produced the solution before the initial solution is updated.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
Nick Coleman
